atlasforge.name: AtlasForge Interactive
atlasforge.title: AtlasForge Interactive
atlasforge.shortDescription: Umbrella hub where our tools, engine, and worlds converge with a magenta energy core.
atlasforge.description: AtlasForge Interactive is the hub where our tools, engine, and worlds converge. We treat workflows, routing, and sound the way a game treats physics: as systems that should feel consistent no matter where you touch them. From this centre, we build a workstation (AtlasStudio), a language (Atlas-V), immersive worlds like Octopus in Action, and specialised consoles.
bullets: Magenta energy source, orbit lines, and clean geometry tie the family together
Playground for stacks that don’t yet exist, where spreadsheets and simulations share a canvas
Home for AtlasStudio, Atlas-V, Octopus in Action, Decision Console, and AtlasWave

atlasv.name: Atlas-V Engine
atlasv.title: Atlas-V Engine
atlasv.shortDescription: Protocol and language that keeps workflows moving safely across time and space.
atlasv.description: Atlas-V is the protocol that keeps your work moving and safe. It isn’t just an engine; it’s a language that describes how tasks flow, pause, branch, and resolve. With modules like Navigator, Memory, Guard and FlowSim, Atlas-V provides a shared vocabulary for worlds, tools and decision systems.
bullets: Handles concurrency, versioning, and risk so projects stay consistent
Powers branching workflows, simulations, and complex in-game economies
Design sophisticated systems without losing sight of people and stories

atlasstudio.name: AtlasStudio Workstation
atlasstudio.title: AtlasStudio Workstation
atlasstudio.shortDescription: Three-panel creative cockpit for tasks, routes, and experiments built on Atlas-V.
atlasstudio.description: AtlasStudio is your creative cockpit. It presents a three-panel interface for queues, actions and snapshots, letting you manage tasks, routes and experiments from one place. Built on top of Atlas-V, the workstation treats every action as part of a bigger story.
bullets: Drag clips into pipelines, tweak parameters, and watch effects ripple
Keeps story, canon, and production context intact while you work
Living workspace for simulations, audio palettes, and world editors

octopus_in_action.name: Octopus in Action
octopus_in_action.title: Octopus in Action
octopus_in_action.shortDescription: Harbour-city simulation where decisions and Atlas-V branches weave into story.
octopus_in_action.description: Octopus in Action is our flagship world: a harbour-city simulation where flows turn into stories. In OIA you’ll explore docks, towers and markets while managing loops of work, resources and narrative. Characters and tasks are bound together by the Atlas-V engine, so every decision has consequences that cascade through the city.
bullets: Tentacle branches represent different story paths that weave together
Playable proving ground for AtlasForge methodology
Demonstrates how systems with soul emerge from modular design

decision_console.name: Decision Console
decision_console.title: Decision Console
decision_console.shortDescription: Command bridge for workflows, risks, and trade-offs with Atlas-V guidance.
decision_console.description: The Decision Console is a command bridge for complex projects. Powered by Atlas-V, it provides a clear view into your workflows, risks and trade-offs. Visualise decision loops, run what-if simulations, and adjust parameters in real time.
bullets: Unifies dashboards, alerting, and control panels in one interface
Helps teams weigh competing priorities without losing the narrative thread
Built for orchestrating live events or balancing economies

atlaswave.name: AtlasWave (Experimental)
atlaswave.title: AtlasWave
atlaswave.shortDescription: Exploration into reactive sound that responds to Atlas-V workflows.
atlaswave.description: AtlasWave is an exploration into reactive sound. Built as an extension of the Atlas-V engine and integrated into AtlasStudio, it generates and mixes audio palettes that respond to your workflows.
bullets: Craft loops, stems, and soundscapes that evolve with project state
Give worlds like OIA ambient music and dynamic effects
Adds a new dimension to the AtlasForge stack while still taking shape
